trans-unit.source: Represents the <xref uid="langword_csharp_restriction" name="restriction" href=""></xref> element for simple types from XML Schema as specified by the World Wide Web Consortium (W3C).
This class can be used restricting <xref uid="langword_csharp_simpleType" name="simpleType" href=""></xref> element.
Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaSimpleTypeRestriction"></xref> class.
Gets or sets information on the base type.
The use of <xref:System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaSimpleTypeRestriction.BaseTypeName%2A> and `BaseType` are mutually exclusive.
The base type for the <xref uid="langword_csharp_simpleType" name="simpleType" href=""></xref> element.
Gets or sets the name of the qualified base type.
The use of `BaseTypeName` and <xref:System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaSimpleTypeRestriction.BaseType%2A> are mutually exclusive.
The qualified name of the simple type restriction base type.
Gets or sets an Xml Schema facet.

One of the following facet classes: <xref href="System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaLengthFacet"></xref>, <xref href="System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaMinLengthFacet"></xref>, <xref href="System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaMaxLengthFacet"></xref>, <xref href="System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaPatternFacet"></xref>, <xref href="System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaEnumerationFacet"></xref>, <xref href="System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaMaxInclusiveFacet"></xref>, <xref href="System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaMaxExclusiveFacet"></xref>, <xref href="System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaMinInclusiveFacet"></xref>, <xref href="System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaMinExclusiveFacet"></xref>, <xref href="System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaFractionDigitsFacet"></xref>, <xref href="System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaTotalDigitsFacet"></xref>, <xref href="System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaWhiteSpaceFacet"></xref>.
